links.title: Buy Time Warner because there will be a bidding war for hot assets like HBO if AT&T deal is blocked: UBS
links.description: Time Warner shareholders will win even if the merger with AT&T doesn't happen, according to one Wall Street firm. UBS raised its rating to buy from neutral for Time Warner shares, citing the importance of the company's quality assets such as HBO in an internet streaming world.

messages.body: $BB Some thought BlackBerry will go away as it stopped building handsets in house.But it's secret source is in it's Software & NOC $AAPL $FB
$BB When BlackBerry was building it's own NOC & MDM Software, for  smartphone communications & management others had no clue... $AAPL $FB
$BB BlackBerry had to build their own private secure network (the “NOC”, or Network Operation Centre) & management server software $AAPL $FB
$BB BBRY pioneer in Smartphone technology. It had to build every inch of it, on it's own to get RIM pager & then phone to work $AAPL $FB
@ColbyX @JohnChen And yet both $AAPL  and $FB are using $BB software..

$AAPL A company claims that Apple infringed on a trio of patents related to natural language systems. https://stocknews.com/news/aapl-apple-inc-aapl-slapped-with-patent-suit-over-siri/

links.title: Apple Inc. (AAPL) Slapped With Patent Suit Over Siri
links.description: Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) has been hit with a patent infringement lawsuit over the capabilities of its Siri virtual assistant. A company is alleging that the tech giant infringed on three patents as it reaped the rewards for Siri. The News Minute has the news on the suit that Apple is facing.
